content: Hello. https://github.com/rust-lang/zulip_archive does not have an issue tracker so Iâ€™m not sure where to report this. Upgrading the instance running https://zulip-archive.rust-lang.org/ should fix a character encoding bug, see https://github.com/zulip/zulip-archive/issues/69
I'm going to file an issue about upgrading it on infra-team to track it
